column4: hi. i messed up my grub2 and now i'm losing it. how can i restore grub ? output http://paste.ubuntu.com/338158/
have you tried apt-get remove --purge then reinstalling?
: what should i write on terminal?
you shouldn't copy other peoples script directly in case we are full of shit, but "sudo apt-get remove --purge grub ; sudo apt-get install grub"
